name: Esoria
description:
Esoria needs your help

In this Side-Scrolling ARPG you'll take the role of a hero to free the island of Esoria from the clutches of 'Heres' an ancient creature that tries to destroy humanity.

Try out the Demo and make sure you read the "Please Read" section before buying!

 Join our Discord server!

There you can find devlogs, annoucenments, you can give feedback and report bugs.

With influences from the Soulsborne genre and classic sidescroller games, 'Esoria' is not a simple ARPG. It will require patience, tactics and precise planning on your journey. Many of the modern quality-of-life elements are missing, and you're encouraged to explore everything carefully. Talk to NPCs and hear what they have to say. Look at every corner to progress further.

  • Classic 2D Pixel Platformer
  • Choose from one of four classes: Paladin, Mage, Ranger, Thief
  • Explore the island of 'Esoria' with its different biomes.
  • Slay monsters and bosses to equip your hero.
  • Unlock new skills and upgrade your equipment with various materials.
  • Play together with your friend in local coop.
  • The game is still in development. Filled with bugs and glitches.
  • The story is not yet complete, the last three planned areas are in development. Still, a playthrough can take around 4-5 hours. If you play different classes and try different builds, you will have many hours of fun.
  • A Xbox gamepad is required. I do not guarantee that other controllers will work at this time. Keyboard support may follow.
  • The complete item upgrade system will be revised.
  • The areas 'Suzaak', 'The Haunted Forest' and 'Ephiras' will be added.
  • Suggestions from you.
  • Bugfixes.

Since the game is still in development, you may encounter some bugs, feel free to report them via Discord.
